page.title: 10 Lifestyle 1985
page.content: Documentories were popular with the 30-45 year age group, wereas comedies were prefered by the younger ages and children. Music preference was very varied and colourful, peoples tastes ranged from pop, jazz, country and western and opera but the most popular was classical music. The most popular newspapers were the national papers delivered daily.The most popular magazines delivered monthly were SPORTING LIFE, HORSE AND HOUND, FARMERS GUARDIAN.It is interesting to see that the choice of these magazines is perhaps determined by the area and the farming enviroment. The majority of households had two cars which is the average figure for todays lifestyle, although one farm proved to be the exception by having four!
